review: The amazon fire TV is a very good budget device.my sister loved it.it is definitely worth check out
author: Herschell Lawrence

review: As a relative techno neophyte, I was initially dubious about my capabilities with this little bit of hardware. But--it is so easy to use and the world it has just opened to me is fabulous. I have switched to streaming Netflix and Amazon, and the periphery is rapidly expanding. What a sweet Fire Stick, like the old candy, but for eye and ear!
author: Horatio Edens

review: I love this! It was so easy to install and easy to use. I can also watch Netflix along with Amazon content.

review: I was very surprised with the ease of setup and all that the little stick can do. I definitely recommend this product
author: Nichole Appleby

review: Arrived a few days prior to promise - very pleased with this item - super easy to install and operates as expected!

review: I love it for streaming.  It is easy to set up and just as easy to use.

review: Super easy and portable. Remote does not need to be "aimed" at the TV to work.  The Netflix app has good a format and is simple to use. (Better than our other two Netflix-able devices we own).
